subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Snowboarding
Olympic Games (2006)
lead_paragraph: Hoping to redeem herself after squandering an opportunity at gold in 2006, Lindsey Jacobellis, a dominant figure in the snowboard cross, again squandered an opportunity to win.
snippet: Hoping to redeem herself after squandering an opportunity at gold in 2006, Lindsey Jacobellis, a dominant figure in the snowboard cross, again squandered an opportunity to win.
